sentences.stats: Here are some statistics about your server.

noDM.reason: None of the commands of the bot are available in DM.

unknownGuild.message: Guild is not in the database. The bot is now leaving the guild invite it back if you still want it.
unknownGuild.reason: An error happened while joining your guild.

invalidArgument.reason: `{0}` is not a valid argument, please refer to the usage of the command for further informations.

noAdmin.message: You don't have the necessary permissions to perform this action.
noAdmin.reason: You need to have the manageGuild permission to do this.

longPrefix.reason: The prefix has to be less than 17 characters long and cannot be an emoji. It's recommended to choose something short as an exclamation point for example.

twitchTaken.reason: Support for multi server is not out yet, if your channel `{0}` isn't available to you please contact me here https://discord.gg/8mXj3TD with some proofs that it's your channel and I will fix that.

newlanguage.message:
Every message from the bot will now be in : `{0}`.
List of available languages : {1}

newprefix.message: The bot's new prefix is : `{0}`. If the bot isn't working anymore because your prefix is not recognized please kick it and invite it back again.

leftchannel.message: This server is now disconnected from twitch.

embed.description: Here is the list of commands assuming the prefix is `?` :

fields.name: ?help
fields.value:
Description :
Sends you the list of commmands.

Usage :
- ?help

fields.name: ?lang
fields.value:
Description :
Changes the language of the bot

Usage : 
- ?lang English
- ?lang en
Actual list of languages : Fran√ßais | English

fields.name: ?log
fields.value:
Description :
Changes the channel where the events are logged

Usage :
- ?log timeout off
- ?log timeout here
- ?log timeout #channel
`timeout` and `ban` can be replace by each other.

fields.name: ?prefix
fields.value:
Description :
Changes the prefix of the bot

Usage :
- ?prefix something

fields.name: ?reason
fields.value:
Description :
Changes the reason of the ban and the responsible moderator

Usage :
- ?reason id whatever
- ?reason last whatever
You can replace `last` by `latest` or `|`

fields.name: ?twitch
fields.value:
Description :
Changes the twitch channel that the bot is watching

Usage :
- ?twitch channel
- ?twitch disconnect

fields.name: ?track
fields.value:
Description :
Finds the twitch id of someone.

Usage :
- ?track twitchname
